Content Requirements for BioCatalogue Pilot

  • [Must] 12 already annotated services
  • [Must] All Feta services that have been annotated
  • [Must] Import some Soaplab services
  • [Must] Embrace services
  • [Should] EBI services
  • [Could] All Feta services that have NOT been annotated (taking into account overlap with other content requirements)
  • [Could] All Feta annotations
  • [Could] BioMoby (import through API) - ask BioMoby people ?
